value.stringValue: Missing Contact for Status Email to Host Account

We tried to send a status update email regarding this campaign

{!$Record.Venue__c} (Start: {!$Record.Start__c}) but could not find a Contact.


Link to Campaign

https://dfj.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/{!$Record.Id}/view


Link to Account

https://dfj.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/{!$Record.Account__c}/view

textTemplates.name: rtEmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.Owner.FirstName},


There is an upcoming lecture at {!$Record.Account__r.Name} at {!$Record.Start__c}.

We tried to send a status update, containing information about number of bookings, etc. to the host on the email {!Contact.Email}.


Please reach out to the Host and get their updated information


Error:

{!CustomError}

textTemplates.name: txtDK_BillingInformation
textTemplates.text:
Fakturering og betalingsbetingelser

Send venligst alle fakturaer til foredrag.faktura@dinfamiliejurist.dk. Husk at inkludere bank- og kontooplysninger samt CVR-nummer p alle fakturaer.

textTemplates.name: txtDK_Ending_and_Signature
textTemplates.text:
Sig endelig til, hvis I har nogen sprgsml - vi hjlper gerne til, med hvad end det skulle vre!

 

Med venlig hilsen,

Foredragsteamet

Din Familiejurist

textTemplates.name: txtDK_Greeting
textTemplates.text: Kre {!$Record.Contact__r.FirstName},

textTemplates.name: txtDK_Lecturer_Info
textTemplates.text:
- {!$Record.Lecturer__r.FirstName} {!$Record.Lecturer__r.LastName} afholder foredraget og ankommer som regel ca. 30 minutter før starttidspunktet.
- {!$Record.Lecturer__r.FirstName} scanner gæsterne ind, hjælper dem med at finde deres plads, osv.
- {!$Record.Lecturer__r.FirstName} forsøger selvfølgelig også at give gæsterne et venligt skub op mod baren.

textTemplates.name: txtDK_Status1_Above_95
textTemplates.text: Vi er glade for at kunne meddele at der er booket {!$Record.Booked_Seats_From_Airtable__c} af de {!$Record.Capacity__c} tilgngelige pladser til foredraget.

textTemplates.name: txtDK_Status1_Less_Than_95
textTemplates.text:
I skrivende stund er {!$Record.Booked_Seats_From_Airtable__c} af de {!$Record.Capacity__c} pladser blevet booket. Vi skruer lidt op for annonceringen og hber at f booket de resterende pladser ogs, i lbet af den kommende uge.

Sfremt I ikke allerede har gjort det, vil vi bede om jeres hjlp til at sprede ordet, f.eks. ved at dele bookinglinket p jeres hjemmeside, sociale medier, o.lign.

Det vil hjlpe til, at vi fr alle pladserne booket og p den mde, sikre en successfuld aften for bde for os, jer og kunderne.

Bookinglinket her her:

{!$Record.Webflow_URL__c}

 

Uanset hvad, s ser vi frem til et godt event d. {!$Record.Start__c}

textTemplates.name: txtDK_Status1_Looking_Forward
textTemplates.text: Vi ser frem til foredraget hos jer, nste uge, {!DK_Weekday_EventStart},d. {!$Record.Start__c}

textTemplates.name: txtDK_Status2_Above_95
textTemplates.text:
Vi sendte dig mandag en opdatering med bookingantallet og kan med glde meddele at der nu er booket {!$Record.Booked_Seats_From_Airtable__c} af de tilgngelige {!$Record.Capacity__c} pladser.
Tusinde tak for indsatsen - vi ses p {!DK_Weekday_EventStart}.

textTemplates.name: txtDK_Status2_Less_Than_95
textTemplates.text:
Vi sendte dig mandag en opdatering med bookingantallet.
I skrivende stund er {!$Record.Booked_Seats_From_Airtable__c} af de {!$Record.Capacity__c} pladser booket. Vi foreslr at lade annonceringen kre weekenden over - og, hvis I ikke allerede har gjort det, vil vi bede jer om at sprede ordet, f.eks. ved at dele bookinglinket p jeres hjemmeside, sociale medier, o.lign.

Bookinglinket her her{!$Record.Webflow_URL__c}

Vi vil gre hvad vi kan, for at komme nrmere et fuldt booket event og hber at I vil gre det samme. 

Uanset hvad, s ser vi frem til et godt event p {!DK_Weekday_EventStart}.

textTemplates.name: txtDK_Status2_Looking_Forward
textTemplates.text: Vi ser frem til foredraget hos jer, p {!DK_Weekday_EventStart} d. {!$Record.Start__c}.

textTemplates.name: txtDK_Status3_Booking_Count
textTemplates.text: Der er booket {!$Record.Booked_Seats_From_Airtable__c} af de tilgngelige {!$Record.Capacity__c} pladser.

textTemplates.name: txtDK_Status3_Looking_Forward_2plus
textTemplates.text: Vi ser frem til foredraget hos jer, p {!DK_Weekday_EventStart} d. {!$Record.Start__c}.

textTemplates.name: txtDK_Status3_Looking_Forward_Tomorrow
textTemplates.text: Vi ser frem til foredraget hos jer, i morgen, {!DK_Weekday_EventStart}, d. {!$Record.Start__c}

textTemplates.name: txtIE_BillingInformation
textTemplates.text:
Invoicing and Payment Terms

Please send all invoices to lecture.invoice@hereslaw.ie. Remember to include bank and account details as well as the organization number on all invoices.

textTemplates.name: txtIE_Ending_and_Signature
textTemplates.text:
Best regards,

The Lecture Team

Heres Law

textTemplates.name: txtIE_Greeting
textTemplates.text: Hi {!$Record.Contact__r.FirstName},

textTemplates.name: txtIE_Status1_Above_95
textTemplates.text: We are pleased to announce that {!$Record.Booked_Seats_From_Airtable__c} of the {!$Record.Capacity__c} available seats for the lecture have been booked.

textTemplates.name: txtIE_Status1_Less_Than_95
textTemplates.text:
At the time of writing, {!$Record.Booked_Seats_From_Airtable__c} of the {!$Record.Capacity__c} seats have been booked. We are increasing the advertising a bit and hope to book the remaining seats as well during the coming week.

If you havent already done so, we would like to ask for your help in spreading the word, e.g., by sharing the booking link on your website, social media, and similar.

This will help us get all seats booked and thereby secure a successful evening for us, you, and the customers.

The booking link is here:

{!$Record.Webflow_URL__c}

 

In any case, we look forward to a great event on {!$Record.Start__c}

textTemplates.name: txtIE_Status1_Looking_Forward
textTemplates.text: We look forward to the lecture at your place next week, {!SE_Weekday_EventStart}, on {!$Record.Start__c}

textTemplates.name: txtIE_Status2_Above_95
textTemplates.text:
We sent you an update on Monday about the booking numbers and are happy to announce that {!$Record.Booked_Seats_From_Airtable__c} of the available {!$Record.Capacity__c} seats have now been booked.
Many thanks for your effort well see you on {!SE_Weekday_EventStart}.

textTemplates.name: txtIE_Status2_Less_Than_95
textTemplates.text:
We sent you an update on Monday about the booking numbers.
At the time of writing, {!$Record.Booked_Seats_From_Airtable__c} of the {!$Record.Capacity__c} seats have been booked. We suggest letting the advertising continue over the weekend and, if you havent already done so, we ask you to help spread the word, e.g., by sharing the booking link on your website, social media, and similar.

The booking link is here{!$Record.Webflow_URL__c}

We will do what we can to move towards a fully booked event and hope you will do the same.

In any case, we look forward to a great event on {!SE_Weekday_EventStart}.

textTemplates.name: txtIE_Status2_Looking_Forward
textTemplates.text: We look forward to the lecture at your place on {!SE_Weekday_EventStart}, {!$Record.Start__c}.

textTemplates.name: txtIE_Status3_Booking_Count
textTemplates.text: {!$Record.Booked_Seats_From_Airtable__c} of the available {!$Record.Capacity__c} seats have been booked.

textTemplates.name: txtIE_Status3_Looking_Forward_2plus
textTemplates.text: We look forward to the lecture at your place on {!SE_Weekday_EventStart}, {!$Record.Start__c}.

textTemplates.name: txtIE_Status3_Looking_Forward_Tomorrow
textTemplates.text: We look forward to the lecture at your place tomorrow, {!SE_Weekday_EventStart}, on {!$Record.Start__c}

textTemplates.name: txtSE_BillingInformation
textTemplates.text:
Fakturering och betalningsvillkor

Vnligen skicka alla fakturor till foredrag.faktura@dinfamiljejurist.se. Kom ihg att inkludera bank- och kontouppgifter samt organisationsnummer p alla fakturor.

textTemplates.name: txtSE_Ending_and_Signature
textTemplates.text:
Med vnliga hlsningar,

Fredragsteamet

Din Familjejurist

textTemplates.name: txtSE_Greeting
textTemplates.text: Hej {!$Record.Contact__r.FirstName},

textTemplates.name: txtSE_Lecturer_Info
textTemplates.text: - {!$Record.Lecturer__r.FirstName} {!$Record.Lecturer__r.LastName} håller föredraget och anländer vanligtvis cirka 30 minuter före starttiden. - {!$Record.Lecturer__r.FirstName}  skannar in gästerna, hjälper dem att hitta sina platser, osv.

textTemplates.name: txtSE_Status1_Above_95
textTemplates.text: Vi r glada ver att kunna meddela att det r bokat {!$Record.Booked_Seats_From_Airtable__c} av de {!$Record.Capacity__c} tillgngliga platserna till fredraget.

textTemplates.name: txtSE_Status1_Less_Than_95
textTemplates.text:
I skrivande stund r {!$Record.Booked_Seats_From_Airtable__c} av de {!$Record.Capacity__c} platserna bokade. Vi kar lite p annonseringen och hoppas kunna boka de terstende platserna ocks, under den kommande veckan.

Om ni inte redan har gjort det, skulle vi vilja be om er hjlp att sprida ordet, t.ex. genom att dela bokningslnken p er hemsida, sociala medier, och liknande.

Det kommer att hjlpa oss att f alla platser bokade och p s stt skra en framgngsrik kvll fr bde oss, er och kunderna.

Bokningslnken r hr:

{!$Record.Webflow_URL__c}

 

Oavsett vad, ser vi fram emot ett bra event den {!$Record.Start__c}

textTemplates.name: txtSE_Status1_Looking_Forward
textTemplates.text: Vi ser fram emot fredraget hos er, nsta vecka, {!SE_Weekday_EventStart}, den {!$Record.Start__c}

textTemplates.name: txtSE_Status2_Above_95
textTemplates.text:
Vi skickade dig en uppdatering p mndag om bokningsantalet och r glada att kunna meddela att det nu r bokat {!$Record.Booked_Seats_From_Airtable__c} av de tillgngliga {!$Record.Capacity__c} platserna.
Tusen tack fr insatsen - vi ses p {!SE_Weekday_EventStart}.

textTemplates.name: txtSE_Status2_Less_Than_95
textTemplates.text:
Vi skickade dig en uppdatering p mndag om bokningsantalet.
I skrivande stund r {!$Record.Booked_Seats_From_Airtable__c} av de {!$Record.Capacity__c} platserna bokade. Vi freslr att lta annonseringen fortstta ver helgen - och, om ni inte redan har gjort det, ber vi er att sprida ordet, t.ex. genom att dela bokningslnken p er hemsida, sociala medier, och liknande.

Bokningslnken r hr{!$Record.Webflow_URL__c}

Vi kommer att gra vad vi kan fr att nrma oss ett fullbokat evenemang och hoppas att ni kommer att gra detsamma.

Oavsett vad, ser vi fram emot ett bra evenemang p {!SE_Weekday_EventStart}.

textTemplates.name: txtSE_Status2_Looking_Forward
textTemplates.text: Vi ser fram emot fredraget hos er, p {!SE_Weekday_EventStart} den {!$Record.Start__c}.

textTemplates.name: txtSE_Status3_Booking_Count
textTemplates.text: Det r bokat {!$Record.Booked_Seats_From_Airtable__c} av de tillgngliga {!$Record.Capacity__c} platserna.

textTemplates.name: txtSE_Status3_Looking_Forward_2plus
textTemplates.text: Vi ser fram emot fredraget hos er, p {!SE_Weekday_EventStart} den {!$Record.Start__c}.

textTemplates.name: txtSE_Status3_Looking_Forward_Tomorrow
textTemplates.text: Vi ser fram emot fredraget hos er, imorgon, {!SE_Weekday_EventStart}, den {!$Record.Start__c}
